Hi, @nihal467 
The expand was missing because recent changes were made to the parent component, `TableCell` (only applied after you merged the develop branch). TableCell got a `whitespace-wrap`  added which is why my code was no-longer working, as I have a useEffect that needs to check if text is wrapping in order to render the expand.

Added a quick fix by just overriding the class to  `whitespace-normal`  for this particular `TableCell` element.
Please have a look now, should work!
